name: Le Mat - Agenzia di Sviluppo - soc.coop.soc
goal: We are a Social cooperative whose members are associations and social cooperatives working in the field of job creation for disadvantaged and disabled people. We developed a brand called Le Mat to replicate the know how all over Europe. We are specialized in social tourism.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Public Health, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: We follow the active labour policy and the entrepreneurial training activities for excluded people to become able to create their own social enterprise through the Social Fund and the DG Growth.
